NO ./texture/colored_stone_wall.xpm

SO ./texture/stone_wall.xpm

WE ./texture/colored_stone_wall.xpm

EA ./texture/gray_stone_wall.xpm

S ./path_to_the_sprite_texture
F 220,100,0
C 225,30,0
